contexts.context: ...helpit, of course, neither Wystan nor Chester ever <mark>walked</mark> a yard.
fetched more beer, Frau Strobl <mark>walked</mark> in and out and rolled a baleful eye on...
...village Passes on into a wood: When I <mark>walk</mark> that way It seems becoming to stop And look...
